thread.title: Gregory
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by Gregory

author: Gregory
title: Gregory
text:
Great service. Well packed. I feel that for what i got vs what I paid, just a great deal I couldn't pass up. The carrying case is a riot, what with Volcano Vaporizer boldly emblazoned on the side. I shall carry it boldly. Would probably have preferred some more bags instead of the case though. Shoot, forgot all about the free grinder that was included. Really am very happy in my dealing with Planetofthevapes!
As for the Volcano itself: you got to git one! I got the easy valve classic and it works great.
Will be a repeat customer. Thank you
